Class AbstractTraceableServiceImpl<TEntity,TDao extends GenericDao<TEntity,Long>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.resthub.core.service.GenericServiceImpl<TEntity,Long,TDao>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GenericService<TEntity,Long>, TracableService
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GroupServiceImpl, RoleServiceImpl, UserServiceImpl

    public abstract class AbstractTraceableServiceImpl<TEntity,TDao extends GenericDao<TEntity,Long>>
extends GenericServiceImpl<TEntity,Long,TDao>
implements TracableService
    Base class to put common stuff for service traceability.
    Author:
    "Nicolas Morel "

      • publishChange

        protected void publishChange(String type,
                 Object... arguments)
        Sends a notification to every listernes registered. Do not fail if a user thrown an exception (report exception in logs).
        Parameters:
        type - Type of notification.
        arguments - Notification arguments.
